title: France panorama. [No. 72/35]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Art and environment - statues and sculptures for new housing developments. Tools for all - everyday tools at Paris’ Museum of Decorative Arts. 2. Freight and electronics - computer-controlled automation of the Orly air freight terminal. 3. The arts - Alberto Burri at Paris’ Museum of Modern Art. 4. The Aix-en-Provence Festival - an annual fesitval of music. 5. Fashions - for autumn and winter 1972/73.
